issues.response: We are working on a redesign to improve navigation. This will see a change in how the tile works - meaning not just the text is a hyperlink.

issues.description: Thumbs Up/Down widget doesn't display on all browsers
issues.response: We're optimizing the widget's to support broader pool of browsers.
We are optimizing our backend and implementing caching to improve load times.
We're fixed our site search to provide more accurate and relevant results.

issues.description: Access Denied Errors - primarily in banner
issues.response: We have been further investigating this issue and may have had to do with caching. If you encounter this error - please let us know what page this is on. For the meantime, marking issue as RESOLVED

issues.description: Issues reporting around some versions of screen readers.
issues.response: We have been working with Vision Australia to review and rectify these accessibility issues as they occur. If this continues to occur, please provide device details or contact information.
